DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I. Assess efficacy docetaxel gemcitabine v docetaxel cisplatin patient metastatic locoregionally advanced pancreatic cancer . II . Assess toxicity , response rate , duration response , time progression , survival , performance status , weight associate treatment regimens patient . OUTLINE : This randomize , open label , multicenter study . Patents randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive gemcitabine IV 30 minute day 1 8 docetaxel IV 1 hour day 8 . Arm II : Patients receive docetaxel IV 1 hour follow cisplatin IV 1 hour day 1 . Treatment repeat every 21 day 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 6 week disease progression , every 8 week death . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Up 82 patient ( 41 per arm ) accrue study .
